name: Hircine's Fortitude
description: Invoke the Huntsman's blessing, healing you for 8002 Health and increasing your Health and Stamina Recovery by 5% of the healing caused for 6 seconds, up to a maximum of 333.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health. If you are at full Health you instead restore 3000 Stamina.  While slotted you gain Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%.
effectLines: Increases the healing done and increases your Health and Stamina Recovery by a small amount of the healing caused.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Invoke the Huntsman's blessing, healing you for $1 Health and increasing your Health and Stamina Recovery by 5% of the healing caused for 6 seconds, up to a maximum of 333.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health. If you are at full Health you instead restore 3000 Stamina.  While slotted you gain Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%.

While slotted you gain <<6>> and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by <<7>>.
